        public int collectScore(long currentTime,
                        ScoreTracker.ScoreCalculator scoreCalculator)
        Combine all of the parameters into a single score.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - The end time to use to calculate the total time.

        Returns:
        The resulting score.

      • collectScore

        public int collectScore(ScoreTracker.ScoreCalculator scoreCalculator)
        Combine all of the parameters into a single score.

        This method assumes that the game has ended the instant the method was called.

        Parameters:
        scoreCalculator - The score calculator to use.
        Returns:
        The resulting score.
